page.title: 11Ambulance and Police
page.content: AMBULANCE STATION The ambulance station was built in 1969 and before that it operated from Caistor Police Station yard but now it is situated on Pelham Road.It has 3 ambulances and 9 ambulancemen.The type of calls they get are maternity and road and home accidents which occur mostly in the Spring Street area.They have 2 or 3 hoax calls a week POLICE STATION. The police station was built in 1912. Before that Immingham was too small to have a police station.Now it is situated on Spring Street.There are 3 police cars and 1 police van.There are 30 policemen at Immingham and dog handlers are brought in when necessary. The most recent big emergency was a gas escape at Laportes.
